{{Client event}}
 
This event is called when ped shoots a weapon.  This does not trigger for projectiles based, or melee weapons.
{{Note|This event is only triggered for peds that are streamed in}}
==Parameters==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
 int weapon, int ammo, int ammoInClip, float hitX, float hitY, float hitZ, element hitElement
</syntaxhighlight> 
*'''weapon''':  an [[/int.md|int]] representing [[/weapons.md|weapon]] used for making a shot.
*'''ammo''': an [[/int.md|int]] ammount of ammo left for this weapon type.
*'''ammoInClip''': an [[/int.md|int]] ammount of ammo left for this weapon type in clip.
*'''hitX''', '''hitY''', '''hitZ''': [[/float.md|float]] world coordinates representing a hit point.
*'''hitElement''': an [[/element.md|element]] which was hit by a shot.

==Source==
The [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] of this event is the [[/ped.md|ped]] who fired the weapon.

==Example==

<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addEventHandler("onClientPedWeaponFire", root,
     function(weapon, ammo, ammoInClip, hitX, hitY, hitZ, hitElement)
          if isElement(hitElement) and getElementType(hitElement) == "player" then
               outputChatBox("You hit " .. getPlayerName(hitElement), 0, 255, 0)
          end
     end
)
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>
